title: Double or Nothing
description: Andy's Avengers used to be the winning team for every pub quiz held at the White Lion, Arreton, on the Isle of Wight. It was all good natured fun, and the money raised went to the local hospice.But then Danny's Dynamo's came along, and Andy's winning streak vanished. Andy doesn't like losing, especially to someone as sexy as Danny. Not that he's about to ask Danny out. The Dynamo's team captain is straight.But when Andy's mate suggests he has a bet with Danny on the outcome of the next quiz, Andy decides to take a huge risk - with unexpected consequences.....
author: K.C. Wells
